-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)

comment: Any even Goldbach number is the sum of at most 4 (actually 2) primes. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jul-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-Aug-2020.)
